text: For the week ending 12/13/2020, total #CPG demand was 6% above yr. ago levels. With consumers remaining in the home, as the #COVID19 #vaccine rolls out, cosmetics and fragrance registered 23% and 27% declines, compared to the same period in 2019. https://t.co/M749lMmqGE https://t.co/DSD0T86f04
